content:
Apparently I don't have merge permissions for wasmtime-py, but this PR LGTM: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime-py/pull/45

Fixed Python hello example on README.md by viniarck 路 Pull Request #45 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime-py
When I first tried out the example in the README.md, I hit this TypeError exception: Traceback (most recent call last): File "ex.py", line 4, in <module> module = Module(store...
so it would be nice if someone who did have perms merged it
I see Alex merged the PR, but I now also gave wasmtime-core write permissions to the repo. One of these days we'll clean all of this up ...
